page.title: 08HOLY REDEEMER CHURCH
page.content: The{Church of the Most Holy {Redeemer}is a{Roman Catholic}church situated on the corner of Petersfield Avenue and Redruth Road, Harold Hill. This parish covers half of the{Harold {Hill}housing estate and all of{Harold {Wood}and{Harold Park.}It is served by two priests:{Father Brian O'Higgins} and{Father Brian O'Shea}who both live at the{Presbytery}directly behind the church. The{parish sisters}i.e. the nuns, who work for the benefit of the parishioners, live at the{Ursuline {Convent,}Harold Wood. There are{Masses everyday but principally on Sunday. The times of the weekday masses vary depending on whether the priests are available. About 800-1000 attend this church every week.It also runs various clubs. Some of the main ones are:- the {Girl's Club, the Youth Club,}and the{ {Mother's and Toddler's Club. }
